articles.description: With under two weeks until the second test in Bahrain, Sportsmail looks at what we've learned this week in Catalonia, in a week where off-road matters overshadowed on-track problems.
articles.content: Pre-season testing usually sees headlines focused on early flourishes and teething problems on-track; yet this shakedown week in Barcelona developed very quickly into something far more significant. … [+7798 chars]
